document_data.caption: A piece of molybdena ore.
document_data.name: Molybdenum
document_data.mainbody: '''Molybdenum''' was a rare, useful metal found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Description: The ore of molybdenum, [[wikipedia:molybdena|molybdena]], was a soft, lustrous black metallic mineral with an appearance similar to [[plumbago]].
document_data.Availability: The [[Elemental Store]] of the [[Karsus Enclave]] sold pure elemental molybdenum for 10 [[gp]] per ounce.
document_data.Usages:
[[File:Ship Bolts.png|thumb|''An alloyed bolt.'']]
Molybdenum was prized for its uses in alloys. It was alloyed with [[adamantine]], [[steel]], and [[titansteel]] to make strong and durable [[Bolt (fastener)|bolt]], [[rivet]]s, [[nail]]s, [[wire]], and blades. It improved the weldability of adamantine, and improved the lamination of steel as well as its resistance to rust and corrosion.
